Text: With more TV and movies than ever right at our fingertips, where are you meant to begin?! Welcome to HELLO!'s TV and Film section where we aim to bring you all of the latest news, recommendations, interviews and more from your fave shows and movies of the moment - covering everything from dancing competitions to Netflix's hottest new drama. So sit back and enjoy the show! Model Abbey Clancy has curated another stellar edit with F&F at Tesco, with prices for the AW25 supermarket range starting at £10 In partnership with F&F at Tesco We spoke to women’s health specialist Dr Janine David for her top tips and product recommendations for menopausal skin during autumn and winter We’re in a new era of aesthetics, with more and more women seeking natural results from their beauty treatments In partnership with Galderma These comfy black leggings are in high demand, thanks to their smoothing, lifting abilities and athleisurewear vibes. Shop the viral black leggings. Supported by BetterMe The Line of Duty and The Crown star, who plays Peter Hammond in Channel 4's latest factual drama, suffered the loss of his daughter Maude 15 years ago Robert Aramayo stars in I Swear alongside Shirley Henderson and Maxine Peake – and it's set to land on Netflix very soon John Davidson, who has Tourette syndrome, shouted out a racial slur during the BAFTAs on Sunday at London's Royal Festival Hall The Grantchester actor stars opposite Jason Watkins in the popular Channel 5 thriller, The Game. Filming on season two is underway Viewers have been loving the return of Jennifer Garner's thriller, The Last Thing He Told Me, which lands on Apple TV+ every Friday Paradise season two sees the return of Sterling K Brown and Sarah Shahi alongside newcomers Shailene Woodley and Thomas Doherty Hayley Squires and Bel Powley star in the upcoming coastal-set drama, Shy & Lola, about an unlikely duo who become entangled in a criminal underworld From Netflix and Disney+ to ITV, Channel 4 and Prime Video, these are the top five shows you'll be scrambling to binge-watch this week
